com.brightcove.player.event

Interface Component

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractButtonController, AbstractComponent, AbstractOnceUxManager, AdCuePointComponent, AdInfoOverlayManager, AdMetadataStateManager, Analytics, BaseVideoView, BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController, BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView, BrightcoveExoPlayerVideoView, BrightcoveMediaController, BrightcovePlayer, BrightcovePluginManager, BrightcoveSeekBarController, BrightcoveShowHideController, BrightcoveTextureVideoView, BrightcoveVideoView, CaptionsButtonController, Catalog, Catalog, CompanionAdManager, DefaultSourceSelectionController, ExoPlayerSourceSelectionController, ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent, FindVideoTask, FreeWheelController, FullScreenButtonController, GoogleCastComponent, GoogleIMAComponent, LiveButtonController, LoadCaptionsService, LoadCaptionsTask, LoadImageTask, MediaService, OmnitureComponent, OnceUxComponent, PlayButtonController, ProgressManager, RewindButtonController, SeamlessSourceSelectionController, SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent, SeamlessVideoView, SeekManager, VideoDisplayComponent, VideoPlaybackController, VideoStillDisplayComponent, VMAPComponent, WidevinePlugin

    @Emits(events={"sample","event","list"})
@ListensFor(events={"play","stop"})
public interface Component
    Classes that implement this interface will be designed to work with the EventEmitter System Classes that implement this interface should use the Emits and ListensFor annotations
